::Firaxis::
     He stands up and walks away.  When he gets to his ship he opens a wide-band frequency to the planet.  "This is Firaxis again.  I just finished speaking with a kind lady who says she was sent by the Vok.  She says she'll kill us all if you destroy another "sphere" whatever that is."  He sighs and turns off the com.  He walks back over to Meteara.  "I sent your message but I doubt anyone will notice."
